modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod allows you to craft the Weapons Bags(Small/Large) and Hardened Chests found in POIs.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod allows you to craft the [Weapons](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) Bags(Small/Large) and Hardened Chests found in POIs.

**[Download](https://github.com/GopherMods/7DTDMods/raw/master/CraftableWeaponsBagsAndHardenedChest.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17309-gophers-modlets-not-an-all-in-one-pack/).

**Credits:** [Gopher](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/gopher/)
